attributes.action: Publish the findings of a Co-vid Public Inquiry prior to the General Election
attributes.additional_details: There is an urgent need to understand what happened with regard to the UK's handling of Co-vid. The public absolutely deserve to have questions answered and ministers held to account.
attributes.background: I would like Parliament to be able to discuss the remit of the inquiry, taking into account the scale of the deaths in the UK ,and make the Government commit to publishing the inquiry findings prior to the General Election.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ensure the public inquiry into Covid-19 reports before the next General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585861
